title: Create CAR MODEL VARIANT-achieved-session-result Relationship
description:
* The relationship ›achieved-session-result‹ is created when the provided IDs of the CAR MODEL VARIANT and SESSION RESULT are valid. -> Status Code \`201\`
* A successful request returns the ID of the created relationship, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code \`404\`
* The same ›achieved-session-result‹ relationship between the same nodes can only be created once. Attempts to recreate them will be ignored. -> Status Code \`304\`
* Each CAR MODEL VARIANT can be in a ›achieved-session-result‹ relationship with multiple SESSION RESULTS
